main event: On 7 May 1956 in Crestview, Florida, a military observation reported a single object exhibiting erratic movement and disappearance, with the conclusion suggesting it was possibly a balloon.
interesting points: The object was described as a point of light, the size of a pin, blinking in a bluish color, and exhibiting slow and round movement.
The observation lasted for 3 minutes, and the object was seen twice.
The conclusion pointed to erratic movement and disappearance by rising/falling, indicative of balloon observation.
The document includes detailed information about the weather conditions and winds aloft at the time and place of the sighting.
The observation took place at dusk, and the observers were located at the office at Crestview Airport, FL.
sighted object: Single object exhibiting erratic movement and disappearance
